ValidationRule.description: Webinar Registration Order Form Ticket requires the Sponsor-Coded Link field when status changes to "Invite Sent for Approval"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordTypeId = '0121O000001lst2' /*Webinar Registration Order Form*/, ISBLANK(Sponsor_Coded_Link__c ), ISCHANGED (Phase__c), TEXT(PRIORVALUE (Phase__c)) = "In Progress", ISPICKVAL(Phase__c, "Invite Sent for Approval") )
